A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it has a few moments I liked\, the poor use of characters and really disappointing plot made this movie probably my least favorite of all the Star Wars movies. The connection between Rey and Kylo up to and including the scenes in the throne room make this movie bearable to re-watch\, but that's about it. Bad choices for and surrounding Poe\, Finn\, and Luke's characters killed this movie for me.
